summary: This document is an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Paul Morris regarding a call with Jeffrey Epstein. Lesley confirms that Jeffrey would like Paul to call him at a specified time. The email contains a confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is communicating with Paul Morris about arranging a call with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email from Lesley Groff, discussing a call with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom Lesley Groff is arranging a call with Paul Morris.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Paul Morris are communicating about a professional matter involving Jeffrey Epstein.
Lesley Groff is coordinating communication on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is being asked to contact Jeffrey Epstein through Lesley Groff.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is arranging a call for Paul Morris with Jeffrey Epstein.
The communication includes a confidentiality notice.
